name: CCBNondihydropyridines
title: CCB nondihydropyridines
description: Includes both immediate and extended/sustained release verapamil, but only extended release diltiazem, per the guideline.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Medications containing nondihydropyridine calcium channel blocker medications.),(Data Element Scope: DRUG_CLASS_MEMBERS: PHARMACOLOGIC:),(Inclusion Criteria: RXCUIs for medications containing diltiazem or verapamil that are prescribable.),(Exclusion Criteria: Invalid RxCUIs.)
